title: Enhancing Medical Practical Competencies: Iterative Improvement Process for Online Collaborative Learning Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning platform navigation and foundational secondary social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners complete at least two social problem-solving projects in triad groups using online collaboration tools (LMS) and expand knowledge utilization range by over 30% by analyzing group interaction path graphs

Learners deepen knowledge construction by at least two levels (e.g., factual understanding → critical analysis) based on digital artifacts (discussion records, documents, etc.) generated during collaboration
Learners can improve group efficiency by over 15% by monitoring interaction metrics (question frequency, feedback depth, etc.) during online collaboration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
